DOC.brief_summary: Previous research suggest regular physical activity may make cancer survivor well long run . Laboratory study suggest stress may bad cancer patient well . The investigator interest whether yoga , practice combine physical activity stress reduction , beneficial cancer survivor . To answer question , investigator need large scale clinical trial . Before investigator large study , need know whether people willing participate kind study , whether yoga practice regularly long , kind change may experience handle daily activity , emotion , sleep , memory problem solve ability , change happen body yoga practice . Answering question study .
DOC.brief_title: Yoga Practice Breast Ovarian Cancer Patients
DOC.criteria: Woman age 18 old History stage 0III breast cancer stage IIII ovarian cancer ; antitumor therapy , exclude hormonal therapy , complete least 60 day prior enrollment ECOG Performance Status 01 ( within 90 day enrollment ) Sedentary : < 90 minutes/week moderateintensity ( exhaust , light perspiration , e.g . fast walking , tennis , easy bicycling , easy swimming , popular folk dance ) physical activity precede 2 month , < 30 minutes/month highintensity activity ( heart beat rapidly , sweat , e.g . running , aerobics class , cross country skiing , vigorous swimming , vigorous bicycling ) past 2 month Evidence active malignant disease Currently breast implant ( limits performance many yoga pose ) Significant cardiopulmonary disease , severe arthritis , glaucoma medical condition make yoga practice unsafe determine study investigator . Patient require regular use beta blocker calcium channel blocker . Use medication would interfere study 's initial blood test , include insulin insulin secretagogues , corticosteroid , daily use NSAIDs ( except aspirin 81 mg/day ) within 7 day initial study blood test . Unlikely compliant study intervention
